movies.title: Danger Dolls
movies.plot: After discovering a portal that allows travel between parallel universes, four highly skilled female assassins from one universe must impersonate a female pop idol group in an other universe in order to stop the evil cult that created the portal by defeating its maniacal leader determined to destroy both worlds.
movies.simplePlot: Four samurai girls disguise themselves as j-pop idols in order to stop an invasion from a parallel universe.

biography.bio: Rumi Hanai is an actress, known for Jellyfish (2013), Danger Dolls (2014) and The 5-Star Tour Guides (2015).
biography.name: Rumi Hanai

biography.bio: Noboru Kaneko was born on October 18, 1974 in Nagasaki-ken, Kyushu, Japan. He is known for his work on Hyakujû sentai Gaorenjâ (2001), Godzilla: Tokyo S.O.S. (2003) and Hyakujuu Sentai Gaoranger vs. Super Sentai (2001).
biography.name: Noboru Kaneko

biography.bio: Kayano Masuyama is an actress, known for Kept (2014), The Suicide Song (2007) and Danger Dolls (2014).
biography.name: Kayano Masuyama

biography.bio: Kôki Okada is an actor and composer, known for Metropolis (2001), Onsen e Go! (2008) and SPEC: Heaven (2012).
biography.name: Kôki Okada

biography.bio: Sho Oyamada was born in Tochigi prefecture, Japan. Sho went on to attend Colorado Technical University in Colorado, where he earned BS in Systems management. He returned to Japan right after graduation of the university and joined a multinational consulting firm as a consultant. A few years later, he went on attend to Henley Business school in Reading, UK, where he studied international securities, investment and banking. He joined UBS as a proprietary bond trader after graduation of the business school. His acting career began when he happened to see an audition ad in newspaper at sports club. This moment reminded him of what he dreamed of being an actor at his childhood. Sho decided to give up banking career for acting. When he left the banking industry, he was quite successful. He made every kinds of effort to pursue acting career and eventually belongs to agency "Stardust Promotion Co., Ltd" which is a leading Japanese talent agency, headquartered in Shibuya, Tokyo. The agency has a dominant share in the management of artists including actors, actresses and singers. His film career started with small roles, in Tokumei kakarichô Tadano Hitoshi: Saigo no gekijôban (2008), Zen (2009), and then Randebû! (2010). In 2010, Sho was cast in a major role, "Seio Watanabe" in the China Hunan Satellite TV series, The Legend of Yang Guifei (2010), which Anthony Wong plays a leading role. Sho had to try to act under wire work and use a sword, but managed well. In 2016, he appears in Shi Gojira.
biography.name: Sho Oyamada

biography.bio: Nana Seino is an actress, known for Tokyo Tribe (2014), The Love Theory (2015) and Attack on Titan: Part 2 (2015).
biography.name: Nana Seino

biography.bio: Tomorô Taguchi was born on November 30, 1957 in Tokyo, Japan as Tomorou Taguchi. He is an actor and director, known for Tetsuo, the Iron Man (1989), Tetsuo II: Body Hammer (1992) and Non-Stop (1996).
biography.name: Tomorô Taguchi

biography.bio: Rina Takeda was born on June 15, 1991 in Yokohama, Japan. She is an actress, known for The Tale of Iya (2013), Dead Sushi (2012) and High-Kick Girl! (2009).
biography.name: Rina Takeda
